movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker is sentenced to life in prison for the murder of his wife, which he did not commit. He forms an unusual friendship with a fellow inmate and seeks redemption.

movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance to erase his criminal history by planting an idea in a target's subconscious, but things don't go as planned.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to destroy Gotham City through chaos and terror.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story of a man with a low IQ who unintentionally influences several historical events in the 20th century.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker discovers that his reality is a simulated world controlled by machines, and he joins a rebellion to free humanity.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: לשחרר את שולי
movies.description: לשחרר את שולי הוא סרט קולנוע קומי ישראלי משנת 2021, בכיכובה של שלישיית מה קשור, אשר מבוסס על מערכון מתוך תוכנית הטלוויזיה בכיכובה, "עם סגולה".

movies.name: חגיגה בסנוקר
movies.description: "חגיגה בסנוקר", הוא סרט קומדיה ישראלי שעלה לאקרנים בשנת 1975 ונמנה עם ז'אנר סרטי הבורקס. הסרט הוא אחד מסרטי הפולחן הישראליים המפורסמים בכל הזמנים, ומכר 607,000 כרטיסים בישראל

movies.name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
movies.description:
2008

Comedy
1 H 56 Min

English Audio

CC14A
Comedy superstar Adam Sandler is back - and funnier than ever - as The Zohan, the finest counterterrorist agent the Israeli army has. That is, until he fakes his death and travels to Manhattan to live his dream...as a hairdresser. Now this skilled fighting machine who used to clip bad guys is out to prove he can make the cut as a top stylist. All goes silky smooth until his cover is blown when he's recognized by a Palestinian cab driver (Rob Schneider).

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
harrypotter.description: The first movie in the Harry Potter series.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
harrypotter.description: Harry returns to Hogwarts for his second year.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
harrypotter.description: Harry faces the mysterious prisoner Sirius Black.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
harrypotter.description: Harry competes in the Triwizard Tournament.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
harrypotter.description: Harry and his friends form Dumbledore's Army.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
harrypotter.description: Harry learns more about Voldemort's past.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
harrypotter.description: Harry sets out to destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes.

harrypotter.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
harrypotter.description: The final battle between Harry and Voldemort.
